title: Eric Swalwell
summary: Eric Michael Swalwell (born November 16, 1980) is an American lawyer and politician serving as the U.S. Representative for California's 15th congressional district since 2013. His district covers most of eastern Alameda County and part of central Contra Costa County. A member of the Democratic Party, Swalwell was raised in Sac City, Iowa, and Dublin, California.
